name: SELF (itch) (shirya)
description:
FOR THE SAKE OF YOUR SANITY, PLEASE PLAY THIS IN CHROME. Especially if you find yourself walking through walls.

You are a little creature thrown into a world that was not made with you in mind. You have to learn to imitate others in order to progress! Press Q, W, or E to switch abilities after unlocking them.

Written in JavaScript using the KaboomJS library for Pride Game Jam 2021. The theme was "journey".

Programming: Juliana Vaculíková

Graphics: Kati Alha

Music: Juliana Vaculíková
